title.rendered: Fall 2021 Recruiting Cheat Sheet: Recruiting Beyond Reopening

content.rendered:
Even as students prepare to return to the classroom this fall, 97% of higher ed institutions and 93% of employers still plan to host virtual career events this fall. That’s a good thing considering that nearly 9 in 10 students still prefer some virtual recruiting even as COVID-19 restrictions ease. How you show up for students will determine how you stand out.

In this modern guide to reopening, we capture the lessons you need to know before embarking on your journey including:

  • How to source new school partners and sign up for their upcoming fairs
  • Ideas for creating meaningful and memorable fall experiences
  • Optimal opportunities to encourage student action
